import os.path
if os.path.exists('/tmp/site.attrs'): file = open('/tmp/site.attrs', 'r') for line in file.readlines(): l = line.split(':', 1) if len(l) == 2: # # key/value pairs #
# # there are some attributes that don't belong in the # database # key = l[0].strip()
if key in [ 'hostname', 'rack', 'rank', 'os' ]: continue
v = l[1].strip() value = '' for i in v: if i == "'": value += "'" value += '"' value += "\\'" value += '"' value += "'" else: value += i
if key in [ 'Kickstart_PrivatePortableRootPassword', \ 'Kickstart_PrivateRootPassword', \ 'Kickstart_PrivateSHARootPassword', \ 'Kickstart_PrivateMD5RootPassword', \ 'Kickstart_PrivateDjangoRootPassword' ]: extra = 'shadow=y' else: extra = ''
os.system("/opt/stack/bin/stack set attr %s attr='%s' value='%s'" % (extra, key, value))
file.close()

/opt/stack/bin/stack set access command='*' group='apache' /opt/stack/bin/stack set access command='list*' group='wheel'
/opt/stack/bin/stack add distribution default
/opt/stack/bin/stack add appliance frontend membership=Frontend node=server public=no /opt/stack/bin/stack add appliance backend membership=Backend node=backend
/opt/stack/bin/stack set attr attr=firewall value=true
/opt/stack/bin/stack set attr attr=managed value=false
/opt/stack/bin/stack set appliance attr frontend attr=managed value=false /opt/stack/bin/stack set appliance attr backend attr=managed value=true
/opt/stack/bin/stack add network private \ address=&Kickstart_PrivateNetwork; \ mask=&Kickstart_PrivateNetmask; \ zone=&Kickstart_PrivateDNSDomain; \ gateway=&Kickstart_PrivateGateway; \ dns=true pxe=true
/opt/stack/bin/stack add network public \ address=&Kickstart_PublicNetwork; \ mask=&Kickstart_PublicNetmask; \ zone=&Kickstart_PublicDNSDomain; \ gateway=&Kickstart_PublicGateway;
/opt/stack/bin/stack set host interface default localhost network=public
/opt/stack/bin/stack set attr attr=os value=&os;
/opt/stack/bin/stack "add host" &Kickstart_PrivateHostname; \ membership=Frontend rack=0 rank=0
/opt/stack/bin/stack add route address=224.0.0.0 gateway=private netmask=255.255.255.0
/opt/stack/bin/stack add route address=255.255.255.255 gateway=private netmask=255.255.255.255
/opt/stack/bin/stack add route address=&Kickstart_PublicAddress; \ gateway=&Kickstart_PrivateAddress; netmask=255.255.255.255
/opt/stack/bin/stack add host interface &Kickstart_PrivateHostname; \ network=private \ interface=&Kickstart_PrivateInterface; \ mac=&Kickstart_PrivateEthernet; \ ip=&Kickstart_PrivateAddress; \ name=&Kickstart_PrivateHostname;
/opt/stack/bin/stack add host interface &Kickstart_PrivateHostname; \ network=public \ default=true \ interface=&Kickstart_PublicInterface; \ mac=&Kickstart_PublicEthernet; \ ip=&Kickstart_PublicAddress; \ name=&Kickstart_PrivateHostname;
/opt/stack/bin/stack set attr attr=ssh.use_dns value=true
/opt/stack/bin/stack set attr attr=discovery/base.rank value=0 /opt/stack/bin/stack set attr attr=discovery/base.rack value=0
rm /tmp/my.cnf
/opt/stack/bin/stack set attr attr=megacli.flags value="WB,NORA,Direct,NoCachedBadBBU"
